# The Mystery of Joe K

_Updated: 2021-11-06_

## Introduction   

These are notes from my investigation of the strange case of Joe K and Being or Nothingness. You should know that I approach this from the perspective of a mystery to solve (Sherlock Holmes style), with the assumption that it's some sort of Alternate Reality Game. It really ticks all the boxes of an ARG to me, but I welcome and respect other opinions. Take these notes for what they are: an attempt to structure a lot of loose ends. /Elias

---

## Timeline
Nov 9 2006: Letter sent to D.H. (attached to BorN).  
Mar 17 2007: Letter to Basic Books (backside).  
May 27 2007: [Mention in Aftonbladet of BorN](https://web.archive.org/web/20130205101605/https://www.aftonbladet.se/kultur/article11077420.ab).  
Aug 20 2008: First mass shipment of books? [Mysterious swedish package](https://web.archive.org/web/20120128143850/http://davidad.net/born/)   
Aug 22 2008: Hofstadter confirms recieving copies of the book   
Nov 12 2008: [Metafilter thread about the book](https://web.archive.org/web/20170617141637/http://ask.metafilter.com/106639/Is-this-viral-I-received-a-strange-book)   
Nov 2009: Second mass shipment of books? [Another mysterious swedish package](https://minutopi.se/joek/Mysterious-Swedish-Package-2.mov)  
May 12 2011: [The Psychopath Test](https://www.amazon.com/Psychopath-Test-Jon-Ronson-ebook/dp/B004XFYWC0/?pldnSite=1) (Jon Ronson) published.  
2011: BorN final edition.  
2012: Ad in New Scientist referencing the countdown timer Beacon of Rational Now.  
Jul 17 2014: Joe K investigation [Metro article](https://web.archive.org/web/20140722195833/http://www.metro.se/jacks-internet/jakten-pa-joe-k/EVHngq!XwybXGNbiOBP6/).   
Dec 21 2014: Full version here: https://kolbjorn.se/2014/jakten-pa-joe-k-directors-cut/.   
Jul 5 2021: New wave of postcards (Sweden only?) https://kolbjorn.se/2021/joe-k-kommer-tillbaka/

## Theories

- **The Joke**.  
Joe K = Joke

- **The Alternate Reality Game**.  
A real life Glass Bead Game

- **The publicity stunt**  
Joe K self/book promo   
Hofstadter self-promo   
Timbro   
Religious group

- **The psycho**   
Doomsday theory (predicting end of the world)

- **The Theory of Everything**.  
Geometric Unity

- **Circada 3301**. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=syYQUCZZHbE&t=159s&ab_channel=VictorMalevich
https://minutopi.se/joek/comment.png
